title: Body of Russian airman killed in Syria returned home: agencies
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The body of Russian air force pilot Roman Fillipov, who was killed after his aircraft was shot down over rebel-held territory in Syria, has been returned to Russia, Russian news agencies Quote: d the Russian defense ministry as saying.
The pilotâ€™s body was recovered with help from the Turkish authorities, a defense ministry statement was Quote: d as saying. There were no details about how the body was retrieved from rebel-held territory.
Reporting by Polina Ivanova and Maria Kiselyova; Writing by Christian Lowe; Editing by Andew Osborn and Robin Pomeroy
